field.name: DESCRIPTION
field.value: #ACTIVITY_TIME_LIMIT# - test time period (sec.) #ACTIVITY_HITS# - number of hits for test period #ACTIVITY_HITS_LIMIT# - max number of hits for test period #ACTIVITY_EXCEEDING# - activity exceeding #CURRENT_TIME# - time of blocking (server time) #DELAY_TIME# - period of blocking #USER_AGENT# - UserAgent #SESSION_ID# - session ID #SESSION_LINK# - link to the session report #SERACHER_ID# - search engine ID #SEARCHER_NAME# - search engine name #SEARCHER_LINK# - link to search engine hit list #VISITOR_ID# - visitor ID #VISITOR_LINK# - link to the visitor profile #STOPLIST_LINK# - link for adding the visitor to the stop-list
